title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog not displayed when dataset is not set
description: When trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset, the group dialog is not being displayed. As per template requirements, the user should be able to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
OB: When attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset, an error is shown instead of the expected behavior where the group dialog should be displayed.
EB:
Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be displayed even when dataset is not set. To reproduce the bug: 
1. Add a table report item. 
2. Do not set the dataset for the table. 
3. Try creating a new table group. 

The user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Create a new report. 
2. Add a table report item. 
3. Do not set the dataset for the table. 
4. Attempt to create a new table group. 

Expected result: The group dialog should be displayed and the user should be able to define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
